AnkiÂ® !Build statushttps://buildkite.com/ankitects/anki-ci This repo contains the source code for the computer version of Anki. About Anki is a spaced repetition program. Please see the website to learn more. Getting Started Anki Betas If you'd like to try development builds of Anki but don't feel comfortable building the code, please see Anki betas Developing For more information on building and developing, please see Development.
